scripts.asbuild:untouched: asc assembly/index.ts -b build/untouched.wasm -t build/untouched.wat --sourceMap --validate --debug --runtime full --importMemory --enable simd
scripts.asbuild:optimized: asc assembly/index.ts -b build/optimized.wasm -t build/optimized.wat --sourceMap --validate -O3 --runtime stub --importMemory --enable simd
scripts.asbuild: npm run asbuild:untouched && npm run asbuild:optimized
scripts.dev: yarn asbuild && cp build/*.map dist/ && cp build/*.wasm dist/ && parcel src/index.html
